column1: Rule 1: Modifiers containing an amino acid structure with a short, unbranched side chain and a terminal carboxylic acid group
column2: Rule 2: Modifiers with a phenyl group directly attached to a carboxylic acid group and an electron-withdrawing substituent in the para position
column3: Rule 3: Modifiers with a sulfanyl group in a simple aliphatic chain
column4: Rule 4: Modifiers with multiple hydroxyl groups in a linear arrangement
column5: Rule 6: Modifiers with a methoxy group on an aromatic ring, particularly in the para position
column6: Rule 7: Modifiers with a long aliphatic chain that lack solubility-enhancing groups
column7: Rule 10: Modifiers with a pyridine ring and electron-withdrawing groups
column8: Rule 11: Modifiers with a benzofuran structure
column9: Rule 15: Modifiers with a carboxylic acid group and a secondary amine in a cyclic structure
